sys_properties_category.name: Virtual Attachments
sys_properties_category.title:
Virtual URL attachments:
Instead of uploading a file directly, the user can instead provide a download link that will be shown as a regular attachment.
If the users clicks the attachment link, he will be redirected to the URL that was provided when creating the attachment.

The following modes are supported:

globalVirtual Attachments are enabled on all forms
tableVirtual Attachments are only activated on the tables configured by the property x_376096_va.virtual_attachments.tables
scriptVirtual Attachments are only activated on records that the property x_376096_va.virtual_attachments.script returns true on
formatterVirtual Attachments are only activated on forms that have included the 'Virtual Attachments' on the form (via Configure > Form Layout)
